page.title: 10TRADE & TRANSPORT
page.content:
In this area there are a few shops and a{market}in Frodsham.The market is on every{Thursday}there is quite a variety of things to choose from.There is also quite a number of{farmers}who grow{crops}as well give {meat and dairy products.
The nearest railway station is {Delamere}where a few trains stop. From there you may catch a train to either{Chester}or{Manchester.}There is quite a good bus service and there is a bus to{Helsby school}and{Frodsham .Also there is a{garage}in{Kingsley {for{petrol.
